document_data.mainbody:
Philbert was a commoner human from the City of Coin, Athkatla in Amn who lived in the 14 century DR.
Philbert met his demise in the . He, along with several other men, was captured by a drow druid PaiNa who built a massive spider nest in ancient tombs underneath Athkatlas Grave District. Philbert and other peasants were consumed from the inside by PaiNas spiders.
